org.zkoss.zksandbox

Class Themes

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zksandbox.Themes

  • public class Themes
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities to manipulate the cooke for theme preferences.

      • getFontSizeCookie

        public static java.lang.String getFontSizeCookie(org.zkoss.zk.ui.Execution exe)
        Returns the font size specified in cookies
        Parameters:
        exe - Execution
        Returns:
        "lg" for larger font, "sm" for smaller font or "" for normal font.

      • setFondSizeCookie

        public static void setFondSizeCookie(org.zkoss.zk.ui.Execution exe,
                                     java.lang.String fontSize)
        Sets the font size to cookie
        Parameters:
        exe - Execution
        fontSize - "lg" for larger font, "sm" for smaller font or other string for normal font.

        exe - Execution
        Returns:
